channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- IPS Engine

item.title: CVE-2023-40718|2024-09-18T19:03:01.519Z -- fortinet -- ips%20engine
item.description: A interpretation conflict in Fortinet IPS Engine versions 7.321, 7.166 and 6.158 allows attacker to evade IPS features via crafted TCP packets.
